title: Authenticated APIs delayed to week of 2/23

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Pat Cavit.9234:

The (presumably) final configuration change was made yesterday to the servers to enable this to work, but we need to spend some time assuring that everything works against Live. More details soon hopefully.

Awesome! A release for today you think? Or later in the week?

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body: The (presumably) final configuration change was made yesterday to the servers to enable this to work, but we need to spend some time assuring that everything works against Live. More details soon hopefully.

comments.author: Suniahk.7268
comments.body: To echo everyone else so far, we’ve been relatively in the dark for so long, it’s really nice to be kept in the loop. Thanks!

Thanks for the update! Your developer community appreciates it

comments.author: Aerodin.2795
comments.body: These things happen. Thanks for keeping us up-to-date!

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body:
Just a quick heads up that the release of the first beta authenticated API is being delayed until at least Monday of next week (2/23). This is due to a variety of not-seen-in-development configuration issues we’re slowly working our way through.

Once the APIs are available we’ll have a post announcing it and providing very basic getting started documentation. More complete docs should be on the wiki soon thereafter.

Sorry for the delay everybody, and thanks for bearing with us while work through this.
